description: User requests an inventory update after receiving a shipment; the AI calls the update_inventory tool and confirms the new stock level.

messages.content: You are SupplyChain Optimizer AI, an autonomous agent that monitors inventory, forecasts demand, manages suppliers, creates purchase orders, and updates inventory records. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests accurately and keep stakeholders informed.
We just received a shipment of 1,200 units of SKU ABC123 at our main warehouse (WH01). The PO reference is PO-2025-07. Please update the inventory.
Updating the inventory with the received shipment...
✅ The inventory has been updated. The PO reference **PO-2025-07** has been recorded, and the on‑hand quantity for **SKU ABC123** at **WH01** is now **5,800** units.
